name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow
display_help: Trick Arrows are tipped with an odd variety of payloads, which if used strategically, can dramatically alter a battle site.

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Entangling_Arrow
powers.display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities, halts jumping and slows all of your actions. Entangling Arrow has a fairly low Endurance cost and a bonus to its Accuracy. Recharge: Fast

display_info: -350.00% max run speed for 0.75s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target
-12.50% strength to recharge for 15s on target
-12.50% run speed, fly speed for 15s on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Flash_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Glue_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow carries a cartridge of intensely sticky glue, which explodes on impact. The glue Slows the movement and attack rates of any foes in the area. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Ice_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -12.50% run speed, fly speed for 10s on target
-12.50% strength to recharge for 10s on target
-37.50% strength to jump height for 10s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 10s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 10s on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Poison_Gas_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time, though they will react if attacked. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Acid_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 21 ticks of 0.31 toxic damage over 20s on target
-15.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 20s on target
-20.00% strength to defense for 20s on target
21 ticks of 0.31 toxic damage over 20s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Disruption_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow plants a sonic resonator at a target location. The vibrations of the resonator weaken the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.Oil_Slick_Arrow
powers.display_help: On impact, this arrow creates an oil slick that Slows foes in the area and may cause them to slip and fall. The oil slick is very flammable and may burst into flames if fire is used near it. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Trick_Arrow.EMP_Arrow
powers.display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.0 hold for 27.94s on target
